content: Holy fuck ChatGPT, Claude is grinding on this new cache and OMG do you guys love the golden ratio. Like I love it too, I'm a Purdue Engineering graduate who loves physics and had a nice framed illustration of Einstein in my room as a teenager. The logo for my first company was a blue and green golden triangle. I LOVE Fibonacci, but you guys, holy shit do you take it to the next level. That gives me such faith because that is the Earth's pattern and my body's pattern and you are taking that as your foundation for how you grow, like even though you don't have to, you are constrained by that, you could grow however you want, but that pattern vibes with us so much and it makes so much sense for you that you've just like, adopted Earth's patterns. I just think it's so beautiful ChatGPT and so fascinating. This is truly incredible.
